casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
James BAKER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2016

Deborah G. Stevenson, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Kathryn W. Bare, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the *233Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 19, 145 A.3d 955 (2016), is denied.
